about.title: About Happy Jasmine
about.description: Happy Jasmine is your premier destination for authentic Malaysian Teh Tarik and premium Happy Tea. We pride ourselves on serving the perfect Teh Tarik Berasa with traditional brewing techniques passed down through generations. Our commitment to quality and authentic flavors makes us the go-to place for tea lovers seeking the genuine Malaysian tea experience.

contact.title: Visit Happy Jasmine
contact.description: Ready to experience authentic Teh Tarik Berasa and premium Happy Tea? Visit us today and discover why Happy Jasmine is the premier destination for Malaysian tea lovers!
contact.address: Happy Jasmine Tea House, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
